name: armcomputelibrary

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: threads
variants.description: Enable C++11 threads/OpenMP backend. OpenMP backend only works when building with g++ and not clang++.

variants.name: multi_isa
variants.description: Build Multi ISA binary version of library. Note works only for armv8.2-a.

variants.name: target_arch
variants.description: Target Architecture. The x86_32 and x86_64 targets can only be used with neon=0 and opencl=1.

variants.name: experimental_dynamic_fusion
variants.description: Build the experimental dynamic fusion files.

variants.name: experimental_fixed_format_kernels
variants.description: Enable fixed format kernels for GEMM.

description:
The Arm Compute Library is a collection of low-level machine learning
functions optimized for Arm® Cortex®-A, Arm® Neoverse® and Arm® Mali™
GPUs architectures. The library provides superior performance to other
open source alternatives and immediate support for new Arm® technologies
e.g. SVE2.

dependencies.name: scons
dependencies.description: SCons is a software construction tool

dependent_to.name: onednn
dependent_to.description:
oneAPI Deep Neural Network Library (oneDNN). Formerly known as Intel
MKL-DNN and DNNL.
